maintainer.name: Vladimir Pavljuchenkov
maintainer.description: Proxied maintainer; set to assignee in all bugs

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Powerstat measures the power consumption of a laptop using the ACPI battery information. The output is like vmstat but also shows power consumption statistics. At the end of a run, powerstat will calculate the average, standard deviation and min/max of the gathered data.
